statements: SELECT * FROM local_guides
SELECT guide_id, guide_name FROM local_guides WHERE guide_id = 1
SELECT guide_location, guide_name FROM local_guides WHERE guide_id > 3
SELECT guide_description FROM local_guides WHERE guide_name LIKE '%Alice%'
SELECT guide_id, guide_name, guide_location, guide_description FROM local_guides ORDER BY guide_location DESC
SELECT guide_name, guide_location FROM local_guides WHERE guide_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM local_guides WHERE guide_description LIKE '%sightseeing%' ORDER BY guide_name ASC;
SELECT guide_name, guide_location FROM local_guides WHERE guide_location = 'Paris' ORDER BY guide_name DESC;
SELECT guide_name, guide_description FROM local_guides WHERE guide_description IS NOT NULL LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1;
SELECT guide_name, guide_location, guide_description FROM local_guides WHERE guide_location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY guide_name, guide_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM local_guides;
SELECT guide_name, city FROM local_guides;
SELECT * FROM cultural_experiences WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT experience_name, location, guide_id FROM cultural_experiences ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT guide_name, years_of_experience FROM local_guides WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT guide_name, city FROM local_guides WHERE years_of_experience > 5;
SELECT * FROM cultural_experiences WHERE guide_id = 2;
SELECT experience_name, location FROM cultural_experiences ORDER BY experience_name DESC;
SELECT guide_name, city, years_of_experience FROM local_guides WHERE city = 'New York' AND years_of_experience >= 3;
SELECT guide_name, city, years_of_experience FROM local_guides WHERE city = 'Paris' OR city = 'London';
SELECT * FROM local_guides;
SELECT guide_id, name, location FROM local_guides WHERE guide_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM cultural_experiences WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT title, description FROM cultural_experiences ORDER BY experience_id DESC;

SELECT name, title, location FROM local_guides INNER JOIN guide_experience ON local_guides.guide_id = guide_experience.guide_id INNER JOIN cultural_experiences ON guide_experience.experience_id = cultural_experiences.experience_id;
SELECT * FROM local_guides;
SELECT name, location FROM local_guides ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT guide_id, name, bio FROM local_guides WHERE guide_id = 1;
SELECT title, description FROM cultural_experiences WHERE location = 'Museum';

SELECT local_guides.name, cultural_experiences.title FROM local_guides INNER JOIN guide_experience ON local_guides.guide_id = guide_experience.guide_id INNER JOIN cultural_experiences ON guide_experience.experience_id = cultural_experiences.experience_id ORDER BY local_guides.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM local_guides;
SELECT guide_name, guide_email FROM local_guides WHERE guide_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM cultural_experiences WHERE experience_location = 'Paris';
SELECT experience_name, experience_description FROM cultural_experiences ORDER BY experience_id DESC;
SELECT guide_name, reviewer_name, review_rating FROM guide_reviews JOIN local_guides ON guide_reviews.guide_id = local_guides.guide_id ORDER BY review_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM local_guides;
SELECT guide_id, guide_name FROM local_guides WHERE guide_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM cultural_experiences WHERE experience_location = 'Paris' ORDER BY experience_name DESC;
SELECT guide_name, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM local_guides LEFT JOIN guide_reviews ON local_guides.guide_id = guide_reviews.guide_id GROUP BY guide_name;

SELECT guide_name, experience_name FROM local_guides INNER JOIN guide_reviews ON local_guides.guide_id = guide_reviews.guide_id INNER JOIN experience_reviews ON guide_reviews.review_id = experience_reviews.review_id;
SELECT * FROM local_guides;
SELECT guide_name, contact_info FROM local_guides;
SELECT experience_name, location FROM cultural_experiences WHERE location = 'Paris';
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;

SELECT guide_name, experience_name, booking_date FROM local_guides JOIN bookings ON local_guides.guide_id = bookings.guide_id JOIN cultural_experiences ON bookings.experience_id = cultural_experiences.experience_id;
SELECT * FROM local_guides;
SELECT guide_name, contact_info FROM local_guides WHERE guide_id = 1;
SELECT e.experience_name, r.review_text, r.rating FROM cultural_experiences e JOIN reviews r ON e.experience_id = r.experience_id;

SELECT g.guide_name, e.experience_name, b.booking_date FROM local_guides g JOIN guide_experience ge ON g.guide_id = ge.guide_id JOIN cultural_experiences e ON ge.experience_id = e.experience_id JOIN bookings b ON e.experience_id = b.experience_id;
SELECT g.guide_name, COUNT(b.booking_id) AS total_bookings FROM local_guides g JOIN bookings b ON g.guide_id = b.guide_id GROUP BY g.guide_name ORDER BY total_bookings DESC;
